dn2:6.2: sañcayo → sañjayo (bj, sya-all, pts1ed) | belaṭṭhaputto → velaṭṭhaputto (sya-all); bellaṭṭhiputto (pts1ed)
dn2:13.3: kañcideva desaṁ → kiñcideva desaṁ lesamattaṁ (sya-all, km, mr)
dn2:18.7: pakkamiṁ → pakkāmiṁ (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed) | anikkujjanto → anikkujjento (sya-all, km, mr)
dn2:20.7: mahākappino → mahākappuno (si, pts1ed) | pavuṭā → paṭuvā (pts1ed); sapuṭā (mr)
dn2:23.2: paro loko → paraloko (sya-all) | sammaggatā → samaggagatā (sya-all); samaggatā (mr)
dn2:26.10: sattannaṁ tveva → sattannaṁyeva (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed)
dn2:35.13: deva, jāneyyāsi, yo te so puriso → yo te puriso (bj, pts1ed, mr)
dn2:37.16: deva, jāneyyāsi, yo te so puriso → yo te puriso (bj, pts1ed)
dn2:42.1: sīlasampanno, indriyesu guttadvāro → bhojane mattaññū (bj, mr)
dn2:44.3: Pisuṇaṁ vācaṁ → pisuṇāvācaṁ (pts1ed) | samaggarato → samaggarāmo (bj) | anuppadātā → anuppādātā (pts1ed)
dn2:51.2: nāḷikaṁ asiṁ → khaggaṁ (bj, pts1ed); asiṁ khaggaṁ (sya-all, km); khaggaṁ asiṁ (mr)
dn2:52.2: janapadakathaṁ itthikathaṁ → itthikathaṁ purisakathaṁ (bj, cck, sya1ed, pts1ed); itthīkathaṁ purisakathaṁ (sya2ed); itthikathaṁ purisakathaṁ kumārakathaṁ kumārikathaṁ (mr)
dn2:69.3: byantiṁ kareyya → byantīkareyya (bj, sya-all, km); vyantikareyya (pts1ed)
dn2:70.5: na ca me → nacassa me (bj, mr)
dn2:80.1: paripphuṭāni → paripphaṭāni (sya-all); paripphuṭṭhāni (pts1ed) | nāssa → nassā (bj) | parisannāni → abhisannāni (sya1ed, sya2ed); abhisandāni parisandāni (mr)
dn2:83.1: So → puna caparaṁ mahārāja bhikkhu so (bj, mr)
dn2:84.2: pītaṁ vā lohitaṁ vā → pītakaṁ vā lohitakaṁ vā (mr)
dn2:86.1: īsikaṁ → isikaṁ (bj, sya-all); isīkaṁ (pts1ed) | Seyyathā → seyyathāpi (bj, pts1ed) | pavāheyya → pabbāheyya (sya-all, mr)
dn2:86.3: pavāḷhā’ti → pavālhāti (bj); pabbāḷhāti (cck, sya1ed, mr); pabāḷhāti (sya2ed)
dn2:96.1: rathikāyapi vīthiṁ sañcarante → rathiyā vītisañcarantenapi (bj); rathiyāya vithiṁ sañcarantepi (sya-all); rathiyā vīthi sañcarantepi (pts1ed)
